text:
1/n This is my first thread collecting information on the use of #chloroquine, #hydroxychloroquine & similar against #COVID19. First of all, a review paper: 
https://t.co/2tT1RThFWD 
It's a murky situation. Nothing known for sure yet. Note difference between in vitro & in vivo https://t.co/35UqZN3HvR
